00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements exponentiation
00004 #
00005 package Parser::BOP::power;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that operand types are OK.
00011 #  For non-numbers, promote to Matrix and check
00012 #    that the sizes are OK and that the exponents are numbers
00013 sub _check {
00014   my $self = shift;
00015   return if $self->checkStrings();
00016   return if $self->checkLists();
00017   return if $self->checkNumbers();
00018   my ($ltype,$rtype) = $self->promotePoints('Matrix');
00019   if ($rtype->{name} eq 'Number') {
00020     if ($ltype->{name} eq 'Matrix') {$self->checkMatrixSize($ltype,$ltype)}
00021     elsif ($self->context->flag("allowBadOperands")) {$self->{type} = $Value::Type{number}}
00022     else {$self->Error("You can only raise a Number to a power")}
00023   }
00024   elsif ($self->context->flag("allowBadOperands")) {$self->{type} = $Value::Type{number}}
00025   else {$self->Error("Exponents must be Numbers")}
00026 }
00027 
00028 #
00029 #  Do perl exponentiation
00030 #
00031 sub _eval {
00032   my $self = $_[0];
00033   my $x = $_[1] ** $_[2];
00034   return $x unless $x eq 'nan';
00035   $self->Error("Can't raise a negative number to a non-integer power")
00036     if Value::isNumber($_[1]) && Value::makeValue($_[1],context=>$self->context)->value < 0;
00037   $self->Error("Result of exponentiation is not a number");
00038 }
00039 
00040 #
00041 #  Return 1 for power of zero or base of 1.
00042 #  Return base if power is 1.
00043 #  Return 1/base if power is -1.
00044 #
00045 sub _reduce {
00046   my $self = shift; my $equation = $self->{equation};
00047   my $reduce = $equation->{context}{reduction};
00048   return $self->Item("Number")->new($equation,1)
00049     if (($self->{rop}{isZero} && !$self->{lop}{isZero} && $reduce->{'x^0'}) ||
00050     ($self->{lop}{isOne} && $reduce->{'1^x'}));
00051   return $self->{lop} if $self->{rop}{isOne} && $reduce->{'x^1'};
00052   if ($self->{rop}->isNeg && $self->{rop}->string eq '-1' && $reduce->{'x^(-1)'}) {
00053     $self = $self->Item("BOP")->new($equation,'/',$self->Item("Number")->new($equation,1),$self->{lop});
00054     $self = $self->reduce;
00055   }
00056   return $self;
00057 }
00058 
00059 $Parser::reduce->{'x^0'} = 1;
00060 $Parser::reduce->{'1^x'} = 1;
00061 $Parser::reduce->{'x^(-1)'} = 1;
00062 $Parser::reduce->{'x^1'} = 1;
00063 
00064 
00065 #
00066 #  Put exponent in braces for TeX
00067 #
00068 sub TeX {
00069   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00070   my $TeX; my $bop = $self->{def};
00071   $position = '' unless defined($position);
00072   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00073   my $extraParens = $self->context->flag('showExtraParens');
00074   my $addparens =
00075       defined($precedence) &&
00076       (($showparens eq 'all' && $extraParens > 1) || $precedence > $bop->{precedence} ||
00077       ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00078         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || ($showparens eq 'same' && $extraParens))));
00079   $outerRight = !$addparens && ($outerRight || $position eq 'right');
00080 
00081   my $symbol = (defined($bop->{TeX}) ? $bop->{TeX} : $bop->{string});
00082   if ($self->{lop}->class eq 'Function' && $self->{rop}->class eq 'Number' &&
00083       $self->{lop}{def}{simplePowers} &&
00084       $self->{rop}{value} > 0 && int($self->{rop}{value}) == $self->{rop}{value}) {
00085     $TeX = $self->{lop}->TeX($precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight,
00086                  $symbol.'{'.$self->{rop}->TeX.'}');
00087     $addparens = 0;
00088   } else {
00089     $TeX = $self->{lop}->TeX($bop->{precedence},$bop->{leftparens},'left',$outerRight).
00090       $symbol.'{'.$self->{rop}->TeX.'}';
00091   }
00092 
00093   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if $addparens;
00094   return $TeX;
00095 }
